<Text: Rock Howard (ロック・ハワード , Rokku Hawādo ) is a video game character appearing in various games from SNK.>

1:
--------------------
Text: Rock Howard:  Rock makes his first appearance as a playable character in the fighting game "", the last chapter in the "Fatal Fury" series, as the new lead character from the series.
Triplets:<Rock Howard
2:
--------------------
Text: Rock Howard:  Rock appears in the series as the son of Geese Howard, the main antagonist from the previous "Fatal Fury" games, who was killed by Terry Bogard.
